pros: Easy to hit Attack Speed cap
Cygnus Knight characters do not need Mastery Books
cons: Main bossing attack forces movement which may be annoying

baseStats: Excludes Hyper Skill Passives, Link Skills, and buffs with cooldowns
Crit Rate: +10% + (35% when in Moon Stance)
Final Damage: +(25% when in Sun Stance) + (5% from True Sight debuff)

Attack Speed (Weapon): [1H] 3, [2H] 4 (additional -2 stages when in Sun Stance)
  • Does not bypass Soft Cap

details: Can be stacked up to 5 times, once for each unique Cygnus Knight to reach Master Level

info: To create one, choose the 'Cygnus Knights' option in the Character Creation screen and then continue through the story until you reach Lv. 10 and Ereve. You will see 5 NPCs on the left after talking to Neinheart. Talk to Mihile to become a Dawn Warrior

details: Put one SP into each skill first and then max each skill in this order
For any skills that have prerequisites, follow them first before following build path
To obtain Call of Cygnus, you need to complete a series of quests in 4th Job

hyperBuild.recommended:
• True Sight - Enhance
  • Divide and Pierce - Extra Strike
  • Careening Dance - Reinforce, Guardbreak and Boss Rush

extraContent.title: Combat Stances
extraContent.content:
Dawn Warrior has 2 different stances that swaps between two skill sets. There is also an additional stance that you gain which allows you to automatically switch between stances and skill sets between each attack

Falling Moon - Moon Stance (2nd Job): Focuses on flourishing crit attacks. Deals lower damage but compensates with increased number of hits per attack

Rising Sun - Sun Stance (3rd Job): Focuses on swift hard hitting attacks. Attacks have increased %Final Damage and you gain increased Attack Speed

Equinox Cycle - Equinox Stance (4th Job): Gain effects from both stances and your attacks automatically alternate between stances while attacking

primary.name: Elemental Slash
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 0, Damage: 130%, Number of Attacks: 1, Max Enemies Hit: 3
primary.desc: Strikes forward hitting multiple enemies

primary.name: Imperial Recall
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, return to Ereve immediately.\nCooldown: 600 sec.

primary.name: Elemental Harmony
primary.shortDesc: Strength increases 1 for every 2 levels the character gains

primary.name: Elemental Expert
primary.shortDesc: Attack Power and Magic ATT: +10%

primary.name: Elemental Shift
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 4, jumps further in the appropriate direction
primary.desc: Double jump skill
details:
Can be activated by pressing jump twice
  • While in the air, if you combine this with the Up Arrow Key, you will perform a vertical jump

primary.name: Triple Slash
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 14, Damage: 90%, Number of Attacks: 3, Max Enemies Hit: 4
primary.desc: Strikes forward creating 3 slashes

primary.name: Soul Element
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Duration: 180, Immobility Debuff Chance: 80%, Debuff Duration: 2\n[Passive Effect: Ignores 10% of Monster DEF]
primary.desc: Grants a chance to stun enemies
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases %Ignore DEF

primary.name: Inner Voice
primary.shortDesc: Max HP: +20%, DEF: +1000, Speed: +40, Jump: +20, Max Speed: +20

primary.name: Hand of Light
primary.shortDesc: Attack +20

primary.name: Flicker
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Damage: 170%, Number of Attacks: 2, Max Enemies Hit: 7 while moving.
primary.desc: Dashes forward while slicing past them
details: Skills listed as a Moon Attack can only be used in Moon Stance

primary.name: Bluster
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Damage: 170%, Number of Attacks: 2, Enemies Hit: 7
primary.desc: Dashes forward while pushing back enemies
details:
Skills listed as a Sun Attack can only be used in Sun Stance (3rd Job)
  • In 2nd Job, you will only be able to use Flicker until you gain

primary.name: Trace Cut
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Damage: 130%, Number of Attacks: 3, Enemies Hit: 7
primary.desc: Slashes behind you

primary.name: Shadow Tackle
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Damage: 130%, Number of Attacks: 3, Enemies Hit: 7
primary.desc: Slashes in front of you

primary.name: Falling Moon
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10, Critical Rate: +20%, Number of Attacks for 1st - 4th/Hyper/some 5th Skills: +2 time(s), Final Damage: -60%. Cannot be used with Rising Sun.\nNumber of attacks cannot exceed 15.
primary.desc: Changes to Moon Stance, gain increased %Crit Rate and increases the number of hits per attack but decreases your %Final Damage

primary.name: Soul Speed
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Duration: 180 sec, Attack Speed: +2
primary.desc: Increases your Attack Speed (by 2 stages)

primary.name: Divine Hand
primary.shortDesc: Attack +20

primary.name: Sword Mastery
primary.shortDesc: One-Handed and Two-Handed Sword Mastery: +50%

primary.name: Inner Harmony
primary.shortDesc: Permanently increase STR by 40 and DEX by 20.

primary.name: Moon Shadow
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 28, Damage: 215%, Number of Attacks: 5, Enemies Hit: 6
primary.desc: Slashes swiftly around yourself

primary.name: Light Merger
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 28, Damage: 320%, Number of Attacks: 3, Enemies Hit: 1
primary.desc: Slashes forward 3 times

primary.name: Moon Cross
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 37, While pulling: Damage: 155%, Number of Attacks: 4, Enemies Hit: 6
primary.desc: Slashes forward while pulling enemies in

primary.name: Sun Cross
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 37, Damage: 290%, Number of Attacks: 2, Enemies Pushed Back: 6
primary.desc: Slash forward while pushing enemies back

primary.name: Rising Sun
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10, Final Damage: 15%, and Attack Speed Increased by 1 stage. Cannot be used with Falling Moon.
primary.desc: Changes to Sun Stance, increases %Final Damage and Attack Speed (by 1 stage)

primary.name: True Sight
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 50, Success Rate: 100%, Enemy DEF in Range: -10%, Duration: 30 sec, final damage the enemy receives increased by 5%.
primary.desc: Applies a debuff to nearby enemies that reduces %DEF and increases %Final Damage taken

primary.name: Will of Steel
primary.shortDesc: Abnormal Status Resistance: +30, Elemental Resistance: +30%, Damage Intake: -25%, Recovers 5% of your Max HP every 4 sec.

primary.name: Inner Voice
primary.shortDesc: Attack Power: +30, STR: +40

primary.name: Call of Cygnus
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, Increases all stats assigned APs by 15% for 900 sec
details: To obtain Call of Cygnus, you need to complete the quest 'The Alliance Gathers' at Lv. 120

primary.name: Moon Dancer
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 8, Damage: 400%, Number of Attacks: 4, Enemies Hit: 1
primary.desc: Slashes in front of you
details: Has a different animation while in the air

primary.name: Speeding Sunset
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 8, Damage: 400%, Number of Attacks: 4, Enemies Hit: 1
primary.desc: Performs an uppercut while on the ground
details: Performs a dive attack while in the air

primary.name: Crescent Divide
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 75, Damage: 295%, Number of Attacks: 6, Enemies Hit: 7
primary.desc: Create slashes that radiate around you

primary.name: Solar Pierce
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 75, Damage: 295%, Number of Attacks: 6, Enemies Hit: 7
primary.desc: Strikes forward dealing an explosive attack

primary.name: Impaling Rays
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 100, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 850%, Number of Attacks: 1, Chance to Incapacitate: 100%, Incapacitate Duration: 10 sec.
Stun Duration: +100% depending on damage inflicted with Impaling Rays.
Damage after Debuff: +850%
Cooldown: 180 sec.
primary.desc: Impales nearby enemies causing them to be binded
details: Deals an additional hit to enemies after bind duration ends

primary.name: Equinox Cycle
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, Duration: 200 sec. During this time, every time a skill is used, the position changes and activates both Falling Moon and Raising Sun effects.
primary.desc: Changes into Equinox Stance, while in this stance, your attacks automatically alternate between stances while attacking
details: You will gain both the bonus effects of and stance when this buff is active

primary.name: Equinox Slash
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, Damage: 240%, Number of Attacks: 6, Enemies Hit: 7.\nCooldown: 5 sec
primary.desc: Instantly dashes forward, damaging nearby enemies
details: Can only be used in the air but can be used while using other skills
You do not need to allocate SP into this skill, SP is shared with Equinox Cycle

primary.name: Soul Pledge
primary.shortDesc: All Stats: +30, Critical Rate: +10%, Knockback Resistance: +100%

primary.name: Student of the Blade
primary.shortDesc: One-Handed and Two-Handed Sword Mastery: +70%, Attack Power: +50, Critical Damage: +15%
details: Increases %Weapon Mastery provided
Now grants flat Attack and increases %Crit Damage

primary.name: Unpredictable
primary.shortDesc: Monster DEF ignored: 30%, When attacking Boss Monster - Damage: +15%

primary.name: Master of the Sword
primary.shortDesc: [Falling Moon] Critical Rate: +35%, Attack Count on 1st - 4th/Hyper/Some 5th Skills: x2, Final Damage Reduction: 90%\n[Rising Sun] Final Damage: 25% Attack Speed: +2, Attack Power: +45
details: []: Increases %Crit Rate and the number of hits per attack is now instead doubled but further reduces %Final Damage
[]: Increases %Final Damage and now increases Attack Speed by 2 stages and grants flat Attack

hyperActive.name: Soul Forge
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 150, Attack Power: +50, Duration: 180 sec.
details: Has no cooldown

hyperActive.name: Styx Crossing
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 300, activates Chase Cut 5 times, dealing 160% damage 5 times to 15 enemies. During Max Charge: Damage: 580%, you can deal damage to enemies with Attack Ignore or Attack Reflection effects. Can move and jump while charging, charging canceled when other skill is used except for Elemental Shift.\nCooldown: 20 sec.
hyperActive.desc: Charge up and release a devastating strike in front of you
details: Attack goes through Attack Ignores and Damage Reflects
You will not be knocked back while charging

You can move, jump and use while charging
  • Other skills will cancel the charge and immediately strike

hyperActive.name: Glory of the Guardians
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, Duration: 60 sec, Damage: +10%\nCooldown: 120 sec. Applies to any Cygnus class or Mihile in the party

fifthMain.name: Celestial Dance
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1000, Duration: 65 sec, creates an afterimage when you use an offensive skill, Afterimage Damage: 55% of Final Damage
Upon using an offensive skill, the sun and moon inflict an additional attack every 5 sec on up to 10 enemies with bonus 100% Critical Rate.
Rising Sun - Damage: 2200%, Attacks: 3
Falling Moon - Damage: 1100%, Attacks: 6
Cooldown: 150 sec
fifthMain.desc: While active, upon using a or attack, the attack will occasionally trigger an additional attack
details: Attack is a guaranteed Critical Hit

fifthMain.name: Rift of Damnation
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 1000, disables Styx Crossing's cooldown for 30 sec and sets skill to max charge, but reduces Final Damage by 50%. Resets Styx Crossing's cooldown upon use.\nAttacking with Styx Crossing creates a rift to the underworld for 10 sec. Continually attacking the area around the rift with Styx Crossing causes the rift to grow, and eventually shatter, actvating an explosion 5 times that deals 1045% damage to up to 15 enemies 6 times. No more than 2 rifts can be open at once. After a rift shatters, you cannot create another for 5 sec.\nCooldown: 180 sec
fifthMain.desc: While active, has no cooldown and is instantly charged when used
details:
Continuously attacking the same area with will cause a rift to grow and eventually shatter dealing damage
  • Up to 2 rifts can be created
  • Has a cooldown (5 secs) after shattering before another rift can be created

fifthMain.name: Soul Eclipse
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 1000, creates an eclipse, attacking up to 15 enemies 5 time(s), dealing 900% damage 30 times consecutively. Invincible during casting.\nEquinox Divide: The eclipse dissipates, triggering explosions 5 time(s) at a certain interval. Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 2500%, Number of Attacks: 15. Invincible while casting.\nCooldown: 180 sec
fifthMain.desc: Causes an eclipse to occur that deals damage to enemies on the map
details: You are initially invincible during casting

Using the Skill again will cause the eclipse to dissipate and cause a massive explode damaging nearby enemies
  • You can invincible during this attack

fifthMain.name: Flare Slash
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 80, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Damage: 1100%, Number of Attacks: 7\nCooldown: 12, reduced by 0.3 sec when changing stance with Equinox Cycle, reduced by 3x when attacking with the Celestial Dance afterimage, and reduced by 4x when Styx Crossing hits.
fifthMain.desc: Periodically creates an explosive attack whenever you use a Moon or Sun stance skill
details: Whenever you change stances during , the cooldown is reduced slightly
When is active, whenever the additional attack activates, the cooldown is reduced slightly
When hits an enemy, the cooldown is reduced slightly

meta: Dawn Warrior is a STR warrior class part of the Cygnus Knights. What's unique about Dawn Warriors is that they have two separate stances that they use for attacking. In 4th Job, you will gain a skill that automatically swaps between forms while attacking
